front.title: IEEE Standard for Information Technology - Telecommunications and Information Exchange Between Systems - Local and Metropolitan Area Networks - Specific Requirements Part 3: Carrier Sense Multiple Access with Collision Detection (CSMA/CD) Access Method and Physical Layer Specifications - Corrigendum 1

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This corrigendum clarifies and corrects isolation text including harmonization for both powered and unpowered Medium Dependent Interfaces
